moves.2. e4: The unusual variant, designed to open the game quickly.
moves.3... Nf6: Developing and guarding the advanced Pawn.
moves.4. f3: De Vore is determined to get rid of the central Black Pawn.
moves.4... exf3: Silman decides to remain a Pawn up.
moves.5. Qxf3: Recapturing and bringing out the Queen, looking for a fast attack.
moves.5... Nc6: Silman continues his development, trying to consolidate his position.
moves.6. Bb5: Down a Pawn, De Vore must remain aggressive.
moves.7. Bxc6+: The punishment for the excessive Pawn-grabbing is swift.
moves.9. Qxa8: Silman resigns. He has no compensation for the lost Rook.
